headline: Rockwell Automation to Showcase Breakthrough Technology and Solutions at Automation Fair 2025
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today unveiled an exciting lineup of new technologies debuting at Automation Fair® 2025, taking place November 17-20 in Chicago. Each year, thousands of industry professionals, customers and press attend to see firsthand what is new and what is next in automation.
